courseInfo.courseName: A Data Science and Statistical Approach to Programming
courseInfo.institution: The City College of New York

lectureTopics: Motivation: Real-world search applications and interview relevance
Linear search algorithm and O(n) complexity analysis
Incremental coding demo: Building linear search function
Binary search on sorted data and O(log n) complexity
Bubble sort algorithm with step-by-step visualization
Selection sort algorithm and comparison approach
Merge sort concept and recursive divide-and-conquer strategy
Brief preview: Object-oriented programming for simulations

readings: Python Data Science Handbook Essential Tools for Working with Data, 2nd Edition (Jake VanderPlas).pdf
